thread.title: Customer Ann Marie Murray
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Customer Ann Marie Murray

author: Customer Ann Marie Murray
title: Customer Ann Marie Murray
text: I desperately needed two new tires for my 2007 Jetta. Town Fair gave me the best advice and price I could have found anywhere. Work was completed much faster than I expected, and with smiles. I was thoroughly satisfied. Great team work, friendly crew. Thank you Branford Town Fair!
